title: Turn your iPad (and your voice) into an immersive storytelling machine with this app
description: Macworld If you’ve got kids with a screen addiction you’re trying to break out of, Readmio might be the digital detox tool you never knew you needed. This interactive storytelling app helps turn bedtime into bonding time, and right now, you can grab a lifetime subscription for just $59.99 (reg. $159) during this limited-time offer. Readmio isn’t just an e-book app. It blends traditional storytelling with real-time sound effects and music, using your voice and cutting-edge voice recognition to bring over 400 stories to life. As someone who used to frantically search for new bedtime material, I’ll admit: having a library of engaging, educational stories at the ready is a serious game-changer. Whether you’re a dad looking for a new nighttime ritual, an uncle trying to impress, or just someone who wants their iPad to be more than a YouTube machine for kids, Readmio fits the bill. The app works on iOS and Android and offers stories in multiple languages, so it’s also great for bilingual households or future globe-trotters. No subscriptions. No hidden fees. Just a one-time payment, and storytime is handled for life. Grab this Readmio lifetime plan to make your kids’ bedtime more interactive for just $59.99 while inventory is still available.
